reviewText: Video is far better than the dvd version.  No discernable difference in audio (stereo-English).  Movie is cheesy, but fun to watch.

Jake (Charlie Sheen), the new kid in town has a love interest Keri (Sherilyn Fenn). Evidentially Keri is coveted by local hotrod gang leader Packard Walsh (Nick Cassavetes.) so Packard and his minions dispose of Jake.

Low and behold Jake has returned in the form of a Wraith. We have a hot time watching the revenge using a Christine inspired car and bike. Will he get them all before the law figures out what is happening? What does the girl get out of this? Who are you rooting for Jake or Skank (David Sherrill)?
Awesome Movie Love the fact that it plays on blu Ray players in america

The Wraith has been my favorite movie for over 25 years and to watch it on Blu Ray is blowing my mind because it is so beautiful, very crisp and clean. I'm noticing things I never noticed before and some of the visual enhancements are incredible.
